sets.tps: 200 HP, 12 En, 88 M Def, 200 R Def / 20 En, 80 M Def
sets.detail:
200 HP and 200 Ranged Defense (+ Heavy Shield) is to be as Ranged bulky as possible 
 96 / 88 Ranged Defense is leftovers and to improve overall bulk 
 12 Energy = 236 Energy at level 50 for (4 Metal Blasts + 2 Perches) with Energy Orb 
 20 Energy = 237 Energy at level 50 for (1 Metal Blast + 1 Gust + 2 Perches) with Heavy Shield
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
